channel.title: agile on Laurent Parenteau
channel.description: Recent content in agile on Laurent Parenteau

item.title: Finding the Best Standup Setup for Your Team
item.description: To address team stress on a time-critical project, we aligned on goals, reduced meeting frequency, implemented virtual standups, and continuously adjusted our approach based on team feedback.

item.title: Beyond Fixed Sprint Duration
item.description: Fixed sprint durations may initially help maintain progress, but teams should consider flexible, natural rhythms and explore alternatives like Kanban to improve productivity and better align with varying task requirements.
